In order to unite the disparate Italian states and pave the way for a unified nation, we must achieve dominance over the majority of these five strategic strongholds before our Sicilian rivals do.\n§BTurin §S- §BModena §S- §BFlorence §S- §BRome §S- §BNaples

In order to unite the disparate Italian states and pave the way for a unified nation, we must achieve dominance over the majority of these five strategic strongholds before our Sardinian rivals do.\n§BTurin §S- §BModena §S- §BFlorence §S- §BRome §S- §BNaples
To achieve the long-awaited dream of a unified Italy, we must be victorious over our rival to once more bring together what has long been divided.
